title: Looking to buy S74 silks with ad backs
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: Looking to buy S74 silks with ad backs
posts.post_content: I am looking to buy or trade for s74 silks with paper ad backs. I need the following HOF's Collins, Speaker and Wallace. Commons I need Carrigan, Criger , Crandall , Hartsell , Murphy, and Schaefer. I look forward to any replies. Thank You
